Events that occurred on 23 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1958 - Actor William Kircher is born.
1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Rayner Unwin.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 336.
1992 - Second day of The Tolkien Phenomenon in Turku, Finland.
2008 - The RiffTrax commentary of The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers is released online.
2011 - Update 3: Lost Legends of Eriador, the third update of The Lord of the Rings Online is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
